description.narrative: Activating Village Court Bangladesh Phase II (AVCB Phase II) Project seeks to support Village Courts in Bangladesh as an effective local dispute resolution mechanism.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: 1.Amended and approved Village Courts Rules in line with Village Courts Act 2006 (Amended in 2013) is place 2. % of Union Parishads with access to a local village court 3. Number of cases referred from District Courts 4. Number of cases filed through village courts 5. Number of cases resolved through village courts 6. # UPs equipped with ejlas (court bench), court forms/ registers and have trained Village Courts Assistants (VCAs) 7 % UP representatives and officials in AVCB project areas who gave correct responses to 9 key knowledge questions 8. % UPs in project area which correctly maintain all VC forms and registers. 9. % of cases heard in AVCB area which are within the VCs jurisdiction and in compliance with the correct procedure 10. % UPs supported by the project which submit quarterly reports to UNO in accordance with DMIE system. 11. % of women involved in VC’s decision-making process
